content.en: Microbe-disease predictions: Scientists have been exploring the use of algorithms to predict associations between microbes and diseases. These algorithms, such as NCPHMDA and KATZHMDA, analyze networks and data sources to make these predictions. By using these algorithms, researchers hope to identify new microbe-disease associations and improve our understanding of how microbes contribute to human health.
content.da: Mikrobe-sygdom forudsigelser: Forskere har udforsket brugen af algoritmer til at forudsige sammenhænge mellem mikrober og sygdomme. Disse algoritmer, såsom NCPHMDA og KATZHMDA, analyserer netværk og datakilder for at lave disse forudsigelser. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer håber forskerne at identificere nye mikrobe-sygdomsforbindelser og forbedre vores forståelse af, hvordan mikrober bidrager til menneskers sundhed.
